name: site-under-construction-template
description: Craft a captivating under construction page for your Gatsby website with our professionally designed template. With its responsive layout, sleek design, and easy customization options, you can create a visually stunning and engaging under construction page to keep your visitors informed and intrigued. Seamlessly integrate with Gatsby and take advantage of advanced features like a countdown timer, progress bar, and social media links. Get your site ready to make a grand entrance with our Gatsby-based under construction template.
author: Darshan Chobarkar
